text:
Hello! I’m very new to HubSpot, but my company has been using it for a while. I am software developer who primarily works with JS.

We have a chatbot on our website controlled by HubSpot and they want to send a *Amplitude* events every time a user sends a message through it.

Is this achievable?
<@U6W3H6YN8> how do I get available to this beta? does this include custom properties for engagements too?
<@ULSCN5SSW> i believe if you just go to the products tool, there should be an opt in
Let me know if not, however, and I can look into it for you
If you DM me your account ID, I can look into it

Hi every one
I can´t resolve this problem
